attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Thousands of British pubs are closing with no end in sight, making this unique  resource in danger of extinction. This petition calls on the governmemt to take action urgently to reverse the Monopolies Commission ruling of some years ago that forced breweries to sell off pubs. Prior to this pub closures were unheard off.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
